title: Consider the Audience
text: The audience benefits from consistency when interpreting similar data.

title: Task Repetition
text: Repeating the same task with the same type of data can be more efficient with familiar charts.

title: Chart Variety
text: While variety can be engaging, it should not compromise clarity and understanding.

title: Innovative Charts
text: Innovative charts can be appealing but should serve the purpose of the data presentation.

title: Purpose of Repetition
text: Repetition in chart types can help the audience focus on the data rather than the chart itself.
